price: Orada, elem dolu azaptan korkacaklar için bir ibret bıraktık.
arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā fīhā āyatan lilladhīna yakhāfūna al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
